sections.title: Agent of the Grave (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Agent of the Grave class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Agents of the Grave gain no proficiency with any weapons or armor.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Agent of the Grave levels advance spellcasting from a previous class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Inspired Necromancy (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Agent of the Grave levels count twice when determining the maximum Hit Dice of undead that can be controlled with spells like animate dead.

sections.title: Lich’s Touch (Su) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: A melee touch attack that deals 1d6 negative energy damage per Agent of the Grave level, usable 3 + Charisma modifier times per day and can heal undead.

sections.title: Unholy [Fortitude](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/combat/#TOC-Fortitude) (Su) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: When gaining levels, the character can choose to add either Constitution or Charisma bonus to hit points gained instead of only Constitution.

sections.title: Undead Manipulator (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Mind-affecting spells and spell-like abilities treat undead creatures as their original creature type instead of being immune.

sections.title: Negative Energy Conduit (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: As a standard action, manifests a desecrate-like aura for 10 minutes per level once per day, and all created undead are treated as if created within desecrate.

sections.title: Death’s Shroud (Su) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Grants the ability to use nondetection or undetectable alignment once per day at the Agent's highest caster level.

sections.title: Negative Energy Affinity (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: The Agent is healed by negative energy and harmed by positive energy, as if they were an undead creature.

sections.title: Secrets of Death (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Allows adding a number of necromancy spells equal to Intelligence modifier from outside the character's normal spell list to their spell list.

sections.title: Undeath Initiate (Ex) (Agent of the Grave)
sections.description: Grants a +5 bonus on checks related to becoming undead and retains Intelligence and free will when killed by undead with create spawn abilities.
